title: 47.1 (LOA)
content:
“Well hullo there!” The distinctive gnomish face of Hy Pimpot peers over the brim of his massive stewpot. “Good to see you again! Feeling hungry, I wager? A craving for mushrooms perhaps?”

You can help Hy Pimpot by gathering ingredients for his traditional stew, or you can clear him with   to take him with you once more.
